glosses: a neighbourhood in Bafra district, Samsun Province, Turkey
a neighbourhood in Çaykara district, Trabzon Province, Turkey
a village in Çorum district, Çorum Province, Turkey
a village in Elazığ district, Elazığ Province, Turkey
a neighbourhood in Gördes district, Manisa Province, Turkey
a neighbourhood in Sındırgı district, Balıkesir Province, Turkey
a neighbourhood in Ulubey district, Ordu Province, Turkey
synonym of Atasu (“a neighbourhood in Maçka district”)

etymology: By surface analysis, şahin (“buzard”) + kaya (“rock, boulder”).
